projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support. 
 - Mobile Responsiveness

projects.title: Cloudx | Personal cloud drive
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Google Drive-like cloud storage solution, enabling users to upload, preview, and manage files.
 -  Integrated AWS S3 for secure and scalable file storage.
 - Built a Node.js/Express backend with MongoDB, ensuring efficient and scalable data handling
 - Utilized React Query for optimized data fetching, caching, and real-time updates.
 - Designed a modern, responsive UI using Tailwind CSS.
 - Deployed the full-stack application on Vercel for seamless access.

projects.title: Deliorder
projects.bodyText:
- Created a full-stack food delivery website using MERN stack.
 - Provides a convenient and reliable way for users to order food from their favorite restaurants.
 - Integrated Razorpay for secure ordering and payment.
 - Deployed the website on Render for reliability a n d scalability.
